<<<<<<< HEAD
1. fill victim.txt as one entry/line with their contact name (contact name need not to be exact or full)
2. run getcookie.exe for only first time to get cookie of whatsapp
3. run app.exe 
4. Enjoy !!! constant beep is online ! two horns for someone getting online ! one horn for someone getting offline

Note: if app.exe failed to login , cookie may have expire go to step 2
=======
1. fill victim.txt as one entry/line with their contact name (contact name need not to be exact or full)
2. run getcookie.exe for only first time to get cookie of whatsapp
3. run app.exe 
4. Enjoy !!! constant beep is online ! two horns for someone getting online ! one horn for someone getting offline

Note: if app.exe failed to login , cookie may have expire go to step 2
>>>>>>> 6a42939a70aac212657571ba2068d6d57bc0fa89
